original: intros net st' ps' d os d' ms h H_doGenericServer H_P H_reachable H_state H_packets. specialize (leader_sublog_invariant_invariant net H_reachable). intros H_leader_sublog. unfold leader_sublog_invariant in H_leader_sublog. destruct H_leader_sublog as [H_host H_nw]. split. - unfold leader_sublog_host_invariant in *. intros leader e h' H_type H_in H_term. eapply H_host; eauto. rewrite <- H_state. rewrite H_state. eauto. - unfold leader_sublog_nw_invariant in *. intros leader p t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit e H_type H_in_p H_pBody H_in_entries H_term. eapply H_nw; eauto.
